name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Edward ROBERTS a/k/a Edward N. Roberts, Appellant

judges: Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO and NEWMAN, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Edward ROBERTS a/k/a Edward N. Roberts, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The appeal is dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
NIGRO, J., dissents.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
692 A.2d 1096
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Edward ROBERTS a/k/a Edward N. Roberts, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Sept. 19, 1996.
Decided April 23, 1997.
Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO and NEWMAN, JJ.
